mapper.select: SELECT ic.comment_level AS commentLevel, ic.content AS content, ic.sepc_name AS specName, ic.created_time AS createdTime, u.face AS userFace, u.nickname AS nickname FROM items_comments AS ic LEFT JOIN users AS u ON ic.user_id = u.id WHERE ic.item_id = #{paramMap.itemId} AND ic.comment_level = #{paramMap.level}

SELECT i.id AS itemId, i.item_name AS itemName, i.sell_counts AS sellCounts, ii.url AS imgUrl, tempSpec.price_discount AS price FROM items i LEFT JOIN items_img ii ON i.id = ii.item_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT item_id,MIN(price_discount) AS price_discount FROM items_spec GROUP BY item_id) tempSpec ON i.id = tempSpec.item_id WHERE ii.is_main = 1
AND i.item_name like '%${paramMap.keywords}%'
ORDER BY
i.sell_counts DESC
tempSpec.price_discount ASC
i.item_name ASC

SELECT i.id AS itemId, i.item_name AS itemName, i.sell_counts AS sellCounts, ii.url AS imgUrl, tempSpec.price_discount AS price FROM items i LEFT JOIN items_img ii ON i.id = ii.item_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT item_id,MIN(price_discount) AS price_discount FROM items_spec GROUP BY item_id) tempSpec ON i.id = tempSpec.item_id WHERE ii.is_main = 1 AND i.cat_id = #{paramMap.catId}
AND i.item_name like '%${paramMap.keywords}%'
ORDER BY
i.sell_counts DESC
tempSpec.price_discount ASC
i.item_name ASC
